title: A true and exact account of Sadlers Well, or, The new mineral-waters lately found out at Islington treating of its nature and virtues : together with an enumeration of the chiefest diseases which it is good for, and against which it may be used, and the manner and order of taking of it / published for publick good by T.G., Doctor of Physick.
author: Guidott, Thomas, fl. 1698.
notes: Written by Thomas Guidott. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
